title: Is government withdrawing hundreds of millions from its Green Homes Grant?
lead: Almost £71 million of the allocated £1.5 billion Green Homes Grant budget for householders has reportedly been awarded

title: Hackers try to poison US town’s water supply
lead: The cyber attack on a water treatment plant in Florida is being reportedly investigated by the FBI

title: Shop with added zip – Lidl’s EV charging milestone
lead: Nearly 1.7 million kg of CO2 have been saved since the first EV charger installation

title: Polluted air ’causes one-in-five deaths globally’
lead: More than eight million people died in 2018 because of fossil fuel pollution, new study finds

title: Octopus Energy launches net zero research centre
lead: The facility will combine energy technology data and economic analysis to accelerate the uptake of green energy

title: State oil firms could lose $400bn in energy transition
lead: Nearly $1.9 trillion could still be invested in oil and gas projects in the next decade

title: Planned hydrogen projects lift off in Europe
lead: Planned or announced projects are almost double those currently operating says report

title: Wales targets net zero emissions by 2050 but aims to ‘get there sooner’
lead: The announcement follows a recommendation by the Climate Change Committee, which revealed net zero emissions, previously thought unachievable and unaffordable by experts, was now possible with ambitious policies and a ‘Team Wales’ effort

title: Israeli forks moo-ve to 3D bioprinted ribeye steak
lead: The technology clones and grows real cow cells in the lab

title: Polish tech start-up lent €7.5m for sustainable packaging
lead: Packhelp allows customers to design and order their own custom-branded packaging made from certified materials that don’t harm the environment, encouraging businesses to boost their own green credentials
